title: God support needs ADC to climb with
body: Currently silver IV. Need god ADC to climb with. Add me if you are a good ADC - Plat+ standard.

replies.body: S4 who deserves challenger, noob tems broke my back tho.
If you are silver you won't be able to queue up with plats.
^Insanely good Thresh support, I was queing with him but now I am in Plat and hes still climbing out of Silver! Would recommend/10 !

For those that can't read between the lines, platinum **standard** requested, not current platinum level, but perhaps soon about to be. Perhaps the original poster kaboomblah is a smurf, perhaps they are just a good player. How do you know? No point judging them.

In the days of dynamic queue, there are plenty of good supports in lower elo that actually **understand** the game better than some players in a higher elo bracket. Before you scoff at them, read it, understand it, and think about it before you put other people down. It's a legitimate request.
